DESCRIPTION: #yUnplayable #yRetaining cards. The effect of the leftmost Trap in your hand is triggered when you take unblocked damage.
Activate the leftmost #yTrap in your hand on a random enemy.
Enemies with Maledict take #b50% more non-attack damage.
Whenever an enemy doesn't attack, deals damage. Halved effect against partial attacks.
Enemies affected by Venom lose #b2 HP whenever they take damage.
#yBlock is not removed at the start of your turn.
Constricted creatures take damage at the END of their turn.
Effect applies during Boss and Elite combats.
